profileAlternative.name: Apurvaa Subramaniam
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist at Amazon
profileAlternative.summary:
I am interested in helping organizations and people improve their decision-making processes through data.

Project Portfolio and blog: www.apurvaa.com

Skills:
Proficient in Python, Java, R, SQL.
Experience with Hadoop (MapReduce), JavaScript, D3, A/B Testing,Spark, AWS, Tableau, Unix, ElasticSearch.

I am currently enrolled in the MS in Analytics program at Northwestern University and have completed several projects with real world data sets using machine learning and data science techniques such as deep learning, social network analysis, predictive modeling, unsupervised learning, data visualization and MapReduce (big data).
Additionally, I have strong programming and communication skills. I graduated from NTU Singapore with a degree in Computer Engineering and worked in Goldman Sachs as a software engineer for 3+ years.

GitHub which contains code samples from Analytics class projects: https://github.com/apurvaa7

educations.title: Delhi Public School - R. K. Puram

items: Computer Simulation for Risk and Operations
Chi Hack Night: Predicting level of e-coli in Chicago beaches
Optimization Project: Kellogg Education Technology Incubator (KETI)
Deep Learning Image Recognition: Detecting Distracted Drivers
Social Network Analytics: What Makes a Kaggle Team Successful
Kaggle Airbnb Contest: Predict First Booking Destination for New Customers
Predictive Analytics: Logistic and Multiple Regression Models to Predict Sales
Text Analytics: Yahoo Questions and Answers
Final Year Project: Autonomous Humans in Virtual World

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Data Scientist III at Amazon. We are hiring!
